Header: Army Categorically Denies Rumours on Conduct of Roadblocks
Content: (Media Communiqu√©) The Sri Lanka Army categorically states that rumours that have been circulating regarding alleged roadblocks, being set up in the North on the eve of the Presidential Election are completely false and baseless. The Commander of the Army reiterates that the Army has taken all necessary measures to ensure voters are not inconvenienced in any manner. (Ends)
